headline: Hologic (HOLX): Assessing Valuation After Recent Earnings Growth and Share Price Recovery
summary: Hologic (HOLX) shares caught investors’ attention this week after the company reported annual revenue growth of 5 percent along with a nearly 20 percent jump in net income. These results add context to its recent share price performance. See our latest analysis for Hologic. Hologic’s share price has regained some momentum lately, climbing over 9% in the past 90 days, even as its total shareholder return for the year sits at -14%. While recent financial results have reassured some investors,...
